page.title: 05Capton
page.content: {Capton}is a beautiful place in a {bluebell wood.}There are thousands of bluebells.In Capton we have lots of farms and a number of old barns.In one{barn}the{American army}was stationed there in world war two. They have drawn spades and axes on the wall but it is now a horse stable.In our village there are mostly modern houses.My house was built by my dad. In Capton we have a{strawberry farm.} It also has a{museum}which has historic rocks. In the fruit farm they grow{grapes}and they make their own{wine.}Then they sell their wine to people . We have an old{slate quarry } but it is now a duck pond.In Capton we have an old track which is called Lee lane and a bridge called Capton Bridge.
